entries.meaning: (offensive, derogatory, slang) The stereotypical behaviours of a faggot (male homosexual) or homosexuality in general.

examples: "I was part of a music forum. We used to make techno-collabs with heavy sampling." He admitted.  […]  "The samples were all from anime and old FDR speeches..."  […]  Gerry stopped, and grabbed a nearby tree for support, cackling like a madman. "I can't stop! I can't...Phil help...I'm trapped in the vortex of your faggotry."
